website_summaries.verdict: If you're leery of non-stick cookware, consider this versatile ceramic model.
pros: Prepares 4 to 12 cups of cooked rice
Can also use for tarts, cakes, and yogurt
Rice cooks well, evenly and consistently
cons: Excess steam can condense in the edges of the lid and drip  into the rice when you open the pot

customer_reviews.title: Persistent chemical smell/taste.
customer_reviews.text: Aroma is right. Persistent chemical smell and taste even after washing and preparing the rice cooker as advised in the owner's manual. I have now cooked and thrown out 3 batches of rice because of the foul smell and taste.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: The coating came off after one use
customer_reviews.text: I used it to cook rice one time. Cleaned it with a paper towel. Then I noticed that the pink coating was coming off of the inner pot. Will most likely return for a metal inner pot.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Navarrete

customer_reviews.title: Inner pot scratches easily!
customer_reviews.text: Inner pot has a clear coat that is scratches easily, even with a wooden spoon! It’s basically not usable. I’m not sure about all the good reviews. I have to return it and got a rice cooker with stainless steel inner pot.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Very Bad Quality, Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: After using for 6 month, all non-stick coating are pealing off. I am worry about the health hazards from eating the non-stick coating now. We are a small family and usually only have two adults home and only cook rice in dinner time. I called their product support and was told that the non-stick material is teflon. We all know teflon can cause cancer. In their product describtion, there is no where indicate the non-stick material is teflon. If I know it's made from teflon, I would not buy this rice cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: If you don't want to get cancer
customer_reviews.text: This unit has a plastic outgassing issue. The inner steamer tray is made out of #6 plastic. Number 6 plastics can release potentially toxic breakdown products (including styrene). Particularly when heated! It has been found to leach styrene–a neurotoxin and possible human carcinogen–and has been banned in cities like Portland, Ore. and San Francisco. Still, it persists and is not often recyclable in curbside programs, though some recycling centers will take it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Tips

customer_reviews.title: Nice rice cooker, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: My last rice cooker was also Aroma, and it last forever. It was not broken, just the nonstiky layer is worn off after using it for 6 years. So I decided to get the ceramic rice cooker with the same brand. The price of it is high, but I think it is worthy. I don’t need to worry about the nonstiky layer anymore, because it is ceramic. It also cook fast and very quiet. Finally the cooked rice tasted really good. So it’s a pretty good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry A

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic addition to any kitchen but needs an initial use to get rid of plastic smell.
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic addition to any kitchen, it does exactly what is described in the description. But I strongly recommend you run an initial STREAM cycle to get rid of the plastic smell. Their customer service department was friendly and told me to fill it with 2 cups of water and either 1 cup of lemon juice OR 1 cup of white clear vinegar and run it for about 15 minutes on STEAM mode. That should get rid of the plastic smell out of the ceramic and cooker.
customer_reviews.author: IntrepidSurgeon

customer_reviews.title: Can't cook with it or keep the content warm.....I have tried for months NOW
customer_reviews.text: After several attempts on figuring out the instructions on keeping the contents "warm" my wife and I couldn't get it to work. And, there is this lingering smell that I can't wash off or figure out where its coming from. I have had this for over a month and I think its worth mentioning.
customer_reviews.author: Won K Kim

customer_reviews.title: This rice cooker is amazing. It is truly great
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker is amazing. It is truly great, chuck it in press a button and let it get to work, the food is cooked great tastes great.Makes rice so easy and cooks it just right.Use it for porridge and will not go back to the stove top. Put your food in set the delay and come home to cooked food, or put it on go to work and it will cook slow all day then keep it hot for hours without drying out. Fantastic tool.It can make considerable quantities, at least enough for 12 people to have a reasonable portion and it’s shamedully easy to clean and maintain. I’d recommend to to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: wayne

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy this
customer_reviews.text: rice cooked with weird taste , also the inner pot got few spots after couple uses , the "ceramic" fall off. Very Bad quality
customer_reviews.author: JJ Green

customer_reviews.title: Great product, get cook'n
customer_reviews.text: Really nice rice cooker. It is very easy to use and it cooks the rice perfectly. The porcelain bowl is really easy to clean-although you have to be careful when handling it to avoid breaking the top edge. The only other issue is when the rice is cooked, there is a small pool of water that catches in the rubber ring. Not a big deal, but you have to wipe it down. Recommended for serious rice eaters. Plus, it does a whole lot more if you need other options.
customer_reviews.author: Tall Tim

customer_reviews.title: This rice cooker is simply awesome. It’s very easy to use without reading the ...
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker is simply awesome. It’s very easy to use without reading the manual. I’ve used lots of rice cookers, but this one makes rice/food tastier than any old ones I own. Rice wouldn't get dry or hard even after hours of ‘’warm” mode. Even the steam plate is of high quality and is very useful. This cooker is not cheap, but you get what you pay for. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bing Liu

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: This item does not even come with a manual. It's a complete science project to figure out what to do and how to cook rice correctly. I like sushi rice and it took me several trial and errors to make something that I can easily make on the stove top. I contacted Aroma and they don't even have a manual for this model. I cannot recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Love this rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Love this rice cooker! My old rice cooker broke after 10 long years, and I am definitely not disappointed in it. My previous rice cooker didn’t have a ceramic bowl, but this was a nice change. Even though the bowl is definitely heavier due to the material, it seems sturdier. I have been using this rice cooker for a few weeks now, and the ceramic bowl has no scratches as compared to my previous one. There is definitely less wear and tear for with this. The additional features are also a big plus, and I can see myself using this rice cooker for a while to come.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice rice cooker - well built
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice rice cooker - well built, feels solid but not heavy. Honestly I have been so busy I have only cleaned the cooker per instructions - place on steam for 30 minutes. The controls are easy to use and the instruction booklet – well the instructions seem very simple. I did not notice any order that a few people mentioned... I am very happy with my purchase and the seller was wonderful, VMinnovations. IF I have any issues I will update this review but I really feel I made an excellent choice with this rice cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Rice Cooker
customer_reviews.text: I received this multi-functional rice cooker a few weeks ago. The ceramic inner pot is what I have been looking for and it did not disappoint me. It can store the leftover in the fridge and reheat over the stove directly, which is very convenient. It is also very easy to clean up. It cooks faster than the rice cooker we had before, very efficient. It is sturdy and beautifully-designed, looks elegant on my counter top. It certainly worth the money! I am very happy with my purchase and I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad that I made this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I made this purchase. The taste of the rice reminds me of my childhood. We used to cook rice in a ceramic pot on the fire. It was the most delicious food EVER!! As I grow older and technology became the thing, we all use the electric rice cookers with stainless steal pot. It's convenient and most safe, needless to say, HOWEVER, the rice just doesn't taste as good. Now with this ceramic rice cooker, it gives me convenience, safety, and the best part, my childhood.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: The ceramic pot inside is just awesome
customer_reviews.text: The ceramic pot inside the rice cooker is just awesome - a level of nonstick I've never seen before. The cooker itself is great - I've never realized how much better rice can taste using a decent cooker like this compared to a $20 Walmart special. I definitely recommend this to anyone who wants a good rice cooker but doesn't want to drop 2-400 on a more expensive import.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Zhang

customer_reviews.title: great! works well at altitude, too
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a great rice cooker. We made brown basmati rice in it, which our old cheapo cooker was struggling with, especially at any altitudes. We have had a mishap or two, but cooking conditions here are tricky, and overall are really pleased. The ceramic rice container is easy to clean, with no weird crevices or chemical nonstick stuff to worry about. I like it, and I only like low maintenance things.
customer_reviews.author: Goldie

customer_reviews.title: Non sticky, worth it to have it
customer_reviews.text: I used to have cheaper rice cooker, and the non sticky coating starts flaking and some will looses its non stickiness . Initially, I doubt about buying this product. Since we eat rice most of the time, i thought to give it a shot. I was amazed by the product as it is very easy to clean, no more waste of the rice. So far I have used this product for about 3 months used at least 5 times a week, it has been remained non sticky. I really loved this product, totally worth my money.
customer_reviews.author: Rira

customer_reviews.title: Love it - NO burnt rice
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been trying for months to find a rice cooker that’s doesn’t burn rice and this is it! It’s a bit larger than I thought but not a deal breaker. Only caveat is that I’m being very careful not to drop or break the actual cooking pan.
customer_reviews.author: MEA

customer_reviews.title: Ceramic Rice/Multi Cooker
customer_reviews.text: I am thoroughly enjoying this cooker. And I LOVE the ceramic bowl! I feel better cooking with a bowl that is not Teflon coated. This cooker is easy to operate, VERY easy to clean, as all the parts are removable. I used to have a Zozurushi rice cooker, which was very good, but very expensive. It worked great until the timer failed and cannot be replaced. So I am sold on the Aroma Housewares cooker!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like the rice smell after the cook by this thing
customer_reviews.text: We are rice family and live on it everyday. This is the first rice cooker we bought from Aroma. The initial use is so easy even w/o looking into instructions. I really like the smell of the rice from which it cooked. Also, it is very easy to clean the inside after serving, which saves me a lot of time to do the dishes. All in all I am very happy with the purchase so far and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane H.

customer_reviews.title: This rice cooker is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought it, I read all the reviews.This rice cooker is perfect size for my family, we eat rice almost daily. I cook all kinds of rice in it. There is a keep warm option that is amazing, when I’m alone at home, I can eat what I prepared 8 hours later and it will taste like it was just cooked and not over cooked or burnt. It works just as expected, it's easy to clean and convenient, I love it! I definitely recommend this rice cooker!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Love the ceramic pot!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically because it has a ceramic inner pot, and I'm very satisfied with the quality of the pot and the design of the unit as a whole. I have cooked both brown and white rice with it, and the rice has been cooked perfectly so far. I'll eventually try steaming vegetables and cooking soups with it, so I may change this rating if those results aren't very good, but so far I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Reasoner

customer_reviews.title: Looks like used
customer_reviews.text: Hi- I received the product today and for some reason it looked used to me. The box was not sealed, the plastic sheet on the panel has scratches and I don’t see the new cooker shine on it.
customer_reviews.author: Akella.Surya Kiran

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty and works wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is the best rich maker I ever have. First, it looks so pretty. I love the overall design especially white outside and light pink inside. Second, the inside is ceramic which is non-stick and non-toxic. Third, it has fair amount of functions which is similar to my instant pot. So far I only used it for making white rice. Using less water and the rice is perfect. Not sure about the duribility yet since I only have it for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Ying Li

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Rice Cooker!
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker has so many functions that it saves me money because I don't have to buy other products for these functions. I love the non-stick ceramic inner pot which allows me to easily scoop out my rice without hassle. It cooked the rice so well, unlike some rice cookers I had before. Making soup with this rice cooker was better than using my pot. It added more flavor than usual. I was very excited to make yogurt with the yogurt function. Overall this is a great rice cooker and all its functions are very useful for cooking food every single day.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: ... been a while that I’ve been looking for a good rice cooker and by far
customer_reviews.text: It has been a while that I’ve been looking for a good rice cooker and by far, this one fits me perfectly for the following reasons: 1.) Doesn’t create water spills. 2.) Doesn’t burn the rice even if you place it on warm mode for a bit of time. It cooks perfectly. I use brown rice most of the time. 3.) it is made of ceramic clay, so in my opinion i avoided the risk of using teflon based material and stainless steel. Con: - the ceramic pot is a bit heavy and so you just need to be extra careful not to drop otherwise I think it may break easily. But overall, I’m satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Mayor

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy! Worst product and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Worst product! Because I accidentally drop the ceramic and called them to get a new ceramic they said they don’t have extra ceramic. They want me to buy a product the whole rice cooker and that’s insane.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle J S. Agustin

customer_reviews.title: I loved this multi-purpose rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: I loved this multi-purpose rice cooker ! It’s very sturdy and perfect for daily use. In my family, we eat white rice everyday and I use this pot to cook rice,the rice comes out super fluffy and perfect,I also use it to cook delicious soup. Simply operation and easy to clean! The handle on the top is very nice,easy to carry and the addition of a steamer tray is a fantastic feature . Happy with it! If you still looking for a good rice cooker,give this a try!
customer_reviews.author: snow lover

customer_reviews.title: Best rice cooker at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: My wife is Japanese and is very picky about what rice cooker we use. She says this one is the best she's ever had. It cooks the best rice, is easy to use and clean, and is very healthy because it is ceramic without any dangerous chemical coating. I'm happy because she's happy, and it wasn't as expensive as similar overpriced units from Japan.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rice cooker for a family of 4-5 people
customer_reviews.text: We bought this rice cooker a week ago and we love it. It is a nice looking and compact size rice cooker. The ceramic inner container is easy to be cleaned. We tried using it for both cooking rice and steam stuff, both work great! The instruction is easy to read. However, it will be nicer if it comes also in Chinese for elderly Chinese people. Another thing it can improve on is to include a quicker cooking function. Although, there is a quick cook, it only shortens the time by five minutes and still requires at least 30 minutes to cook.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good ceramic rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Cooks various rice types well. My Japanese wife uses the “finger method” for water proportions, my caucasian self uses the directions and both yield good, tasty rice. Easier to clean than the more expensive Japanese models. I really like the fact that this cooker does not use “forever chemicals”(nonstick). Only downer is keep warm mode stays on for far less time that the asian import models, so no rice the following day. My wife want to go with another Japanese model, however i would like to stay away from nonstick. Google DuPont and nonstick, horrendous!
customer_reviews.author: sakura vance

customer_reviews.title: Super fast delivery, very good ceramic rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a ceramic rice cooker for a long time, and this is the one meets all my expectation. I always keep changing different rice cookers when the inner pots surface got scratched after using for a while. The new ceramic rice cooker will not have scratch problem potentially and the non-stick inner pot makes the cleaning a super easy job! I have tried regular rice and quick rice functions, will try different functions like yogurt later. The inner pot is a little bit heavier than normal pots, it is ceramic, of course!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy J

customer_reviews.title: Especially my family love to have rice every day
customer_reviews.text: I am a working mom always need to cook fast. Especially my family love to have rice every day. I have a pressure cooker but I feel the rice comes out not soft enough. So I decided to try this lovely rice cooker. Since I received it, I have been using it every day. It only take 15 mins to cook 5 people rice. It is not hard just what I like. Not only rice but meat and veggies. They all came out so good. It is easy to use .It has many functions for all kinds of food. I am going to try them out. Good quality good product,very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: ELIEEN

customer_reviews.title: Inner pot will not last a year.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sept 2019, the inner pot is ALSO chipped without dropping or hitting anything. The pot will not last a year, I should have returned it as soon as I saw how thin it was. Do not waste your time and money!
customer_reviews.author: YudiBoy

customer_reviews.title: If you break the clay pot you have to buy a whole new unit.
customer_reviews.text: Yup-she dropped the pot while cleaning and I had to buy another unit.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Saltzburg

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy to have this rice cooker! I wanted one with no Teflon and this ceramic pot does the job perfectly! Even when the rice remains warmed for hours, it doesn't overcook. We've been able to enjoy our nicer rices without the hassle and with the benefit of tasting them at their optimal flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great Rice Cooker
customer_reviews.text: I love this rice cooker. It’s easy to use, easy to clean. I’ve owned this since Christmas 2018 and have made a lot of rice in it. The inner ceramic pot is incredibly non-stick. I would go with the rice cooker over and over. I haven’t tried making anything but rice in it, but still I love it. It is pretty big and takes up a lot of room on the counter. I recommend it if you like making a lot of rice!
customer_reviews.author: Thelma

customer_reviews.title: Inner Pot CRACKED! Everything is perfect except the durability of the inner pot.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for RV cooking, I was very excited to come home to pick up my package in the mail. First day back on the road and I tried to cook with this and it cracked while cooking. I really like the aesthetic, ease of use and the ceramic material but I wish it was durable. I will be returning this as soon as I get home again. (The box is at home) If they would replace the inner pot with something durable but still ceramic, then i would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The product has chemical smell, tried to boil it w lemon and venegar water a few times , doesn't work, plus the rice was terrible after cooking
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: a great quality rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Aroma rice cooker. My friend recommended this product to me, I finally bought it after comparing a couple of brands. It is really a good rice cooker. The inner pot is made of ceramic material and a little heavier than normal pots. It has the non-stick coating inside, and looks very pretty. The rice turns out good tasting every time. It can make considerable quantities, and it’s very easy to clean and maintain. I also like it has digital controls to make the rice differently. Overall, it is a great quality rice cooker
customer_reviews.author: linhai zhuo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cooker!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent rice cooker. It is not a pressure cooker. It is not an induction cooker. I still love it because the inner pot is ceramic and it has a very good non stick capability. I mostly cook brown rice and the brown rice function is awwsome!
customer_reviews.author: Mama!

customer_reviews.title: Very good rice cooker for large amounts
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a rice cooker with a ceramic pot. The ceramic pot is great - very easy to clean and the rice tastes good. My one complaint is that it is very temperamental on whether it will agree to run when trying to cook a smaller amount of rice. When filling the water to the minimum 2 cup line, it is a 50/50 shot that it will error out. I then have to fuss with it until through some mystery combination of actions, it finally agrees to run.
customer_reviews.author: DT61

customer_reviews.title: Talking with the famous Chef Ming Tsing, he personally reconmended this one!
customer_reviews.text: I talked with the Chef Ming Tsing , He said to get this one. It is great! The ceramic pot inside it is fantastic! Healthy to use and easy to clean! I will never buy another Teflon coated or aluminum pot ever again! This Ceramic pot in this rice cooker is absolutely fantastic. The rice cooks perfect every time, works great, flawless rice each and every time. Sure it cost more than most rice cookers, but if you cook rice often and want the best each time. Buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Chester H

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Looks like there is a nonsticky paint on the surface, but may be not in fact. There is a little plastic smell at first use. Keep the cover the open between the uses, the smell is not noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Good rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice rice cooker and seems to do a really good job of cooking both brown and white rice. Not sure about being totally lead free. I emailed the company about it and did not get any response, which makes me wonder.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: This is easy to use and makes food come out great every ...
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use and makes food come out great every time! I just realized it's not only a rice cooker but slow cooker as well (so no need to purchase a crockpot). Easy to clean, easy to use. The only thing I wish it had would be a top to cover the interior pot once you've finished cooking and just want to stick it in the fridge. No biggie, still a great buy for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego shopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy and useful
customer_reviews.text: The one issue I have is that leaving it closed when not in use will cause mold to develop. To fix this, I started taking the vent out before storing it.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rice cooker, love it
customer_reviews.text: Our entire family is serious rice eater, and we've always used a cheap standard rice cooker that you can get at most retail stores. I never could get myself to pay so much money for a rice cooker like this one. I knew it totally worth the price. It cooks rice perfectly every time and stays warm without drying out. l would never go back for standard rice cooker. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: lydia

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. The ceramic bowl broke the first time I used it and the Manufacturer won’t answer the phone or return my call
customer_reviews.author: patttison

customer_reviews.title: It is best to redesign.
customer_reviews.text: - Overall beautiful outside. -The cooked rice in the middle is dried around the paste overnight the rice dries and falls to yellow. - The power cord is short and hard, it must be plugged and unplugged. --It cannot be used to cook rice, it is only used to cook other things
customer_reviews.author: Luu Khang

customer_reviews.title: but has a handle for easy handling. Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: it's not heavy, but has a handle for easy handling. Very easy to use, I didn't even read the instruction before using and checked only after. So far the food has been amazing and the ceramic pot super easy to wash... although im worried if I accidentally drop it would it break? don't want to try though... :)
customer_reviews.author: Andrea W.

customer_reviews.title: The Aroma rice cooker/multicooker does it all!
customer_reviews.text: We did rice and it cooked it to perfection. We slow cooked a beef roast and it cooked it to perfection. We steamed broccoli and you guessed it, it was cooked to perfection. Just follow the instructions that come with the cooker and you will have perfectly cooked food.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia Davis

customer_reviews.title: it has perfect setting of brown rice options
customer_reviews.text: we use this all the time. it has perfect setting of brown rice options. so far it’s holding up well to use and cleaning. my mom know how to use it to cook rice without my teaching. and there are many functions, i can choose which one I need. it’s good product for four or five family members
customer_reviews.author: vivian

customer_reviews.title: This is the best rice cooker.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best rice cooker. Very easy to use with different settings for different types of rice/style. Good features, nice design, good size, high quality. This does a great job for us, and we have enjoyed every bowl of rice we've cooked. The unit is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Been using it for almost a week the only downside of it is as what other reviewers stated about the water dripping when rice is cooked but other than that it's a useful rice maker. Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it. Like to ceramic inner pot to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the first one because the inner lid warped after the first couple of uses. The replacement came in two days on Prime and, so far, love it. Like to ceramic inner pot to the usual non-stick pot which peels.
customer_reviews.author: Kanga

customer_reviews.title: Makes excellent rice!
customer_reviews.text: Love this rice cooker! The rice is delicious and I like the ceramic pot. It is very heavy and the cooker is really big (much bigger than my old ones), but the rice comes out more moist and tender.
customer_reviews.author: pk

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly cooked rice every time!
customer_reviews.text: My Family eats rice every day and a reliable rice cooker is essential. This rice cooker certainly meets our needs. It has a sleek modern design with several cooking functions. The best feature is the ceramic inner pot, which makes the rice perfectly cooked every time and is also super easy to clean. No more soaking our old cooker's "non-stick" coating pot for hours to clean off the stuck rice.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Sung

customer_reviews.title: Leaves aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: Great product except that it leaves a bad taste on your rice. We tried to boil out the pot, wash it several times and even cooked and wasted several pots of rice but the bad taste remained. The cooker was very good other than that... work on the aftertaste and you have a winning product
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: worth thing
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker was recommend to me by my friend. At first, i thought the price was a bit expensive, but i felt very good aftet i got it. The lineris ceramic. The steamed rice is very fragrant and delicious, and this rice cooker has many functions. The family loves it and it is worth buy!
customer_reviews.author: Hao Wu

customer_reviews.title: Works well, cleanup is a breeze
customer_reviews.text: I had some doubts about the ceramic insert, but so far it's working great. The rice comes out well cooked, but not too mushy, and the rice stays nice and fresh. Cleaning the insert is a breeze too.
customer_reviews.author: alohanoa

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it yumm
customer_reviews.text: I really never thought a rice maker can make a difference but it does this rice maker cooks amazing easy to set well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Odypeny gaming

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best rice cooker even though it's large. Reviews say I can use as a slow cooker so will give it a try
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Delicate rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this rice cooker! It’s very large and is enough to cook the rice for 4-5 people, very good for big family. And I really love the ceramic pot, the rice can be cooked softer and sticky. The cooker also come with a steam rack which is nice, but the rack size is limited for two small buns. It seems that the cooker can also be used for making yogurt, I’d like to have a try in the future.
customer_reviews.author: dash

customer_reviews.title: Great rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Just like the picture. Works great! I love that the ceramic inside pot is non-stick without a shady non-stick coating. The only thing I’m not super crazy about is the rice paddle that comes with it. It’s bamboo and good quality, which is nice, but the rice kind of clumps and sticks to it. But that’s a minor thing. Overall great rice cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Used it one time so far. Cooked quinoa and veggies dish well. Easy to clean. Presents nice on the counter. Hope to use it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: very satifisfied, like the fact it's ceramic and not teflon
customer_reviews.text: we've never had a rice cooker before, but now that we do we definitely won't go back to a pan on the stove. This one is pretty idiot-proof, makes great rice and is easy to clean. We have noticed that the basmati rice get a little too dry for our tastes so now we know to add a little extra water, but jasmine and sushi rice cook perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Inner pot cracked after about 12 uses.
customer_reviews.text: The pot the rice cooks in just cracked on us while we were cooking rice. water leaked to the bottom of the cooker. other than that, and we will be sending this back, it was the best...until it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooker but with chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I use rice cooker almost everyday. I have used different types of rice cookers in the past years. Aroma rice cooker is fairly easy to use and looks modern. I like ceramic container very much and feel it is safer than the the pot with Teflon coating. Only one thing I am not not very comfortable with is the persistent smell even after 1 month use.
customer_reviews.author: Gang Li

customer_reviews.title: I like this rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: I like this rice cooker, especially the ceramic inner container, which can make tasty and healthy food. The different programmable digital controlled buttons are very useful. I think if the cable can be a little longer, it will be better.
customer_reviews.author: hui qi

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I think it's a great rice cooker. Looks nice and easy to use and program. The ceramic pot seems pretty sturdy and should last a long time. The clay pot does come with a smell but went away after airing out.
customer_reviews.author: Max B

customer_reviews.title: multifunctional, easy use,  nice looking cooker
customer_reviews.text: I like this rice cooker. It is multifunctional. It cam make porridge, rice, soup and even yogurt. The instruction is very clear and easy to follow. The most important thing is that it can set up time. So you can just program it at any time and get your food done when you need it. By the way, I love the oval shape. It is more beautiful than a traditional round rice cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Xie

customer_reviews.title: Makes my rice taste great
customer_reviews.text: I had this for almost two years!!!! My rice tastes so good I am obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: Grace90

customer_reviews.title: I like the ceramic insert
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and the sleek look. Ceramic insert is the reason why I purchased this one. Rice cooked better in this one compared with my instant pot. the cooked rice is not that watery. I am satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ling Liu

customer_reviews.title: I was first recommended to this product by my friend
customer_reviews.text: I was first recommended to this product by my friend, and I didn't really believe it at first. But after buying it and using it, IT WAS DEFINITELY WORTH IT! it is really easy to use with the new technology with the cooker. Something I really like about this rice cooker is that it has a ceramic located inside the cooker. The rice was really delicious! I really do recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Good price and high quality rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice looking rice cooker and I particularly like the ceramic inner which is so easy to clean. You get lots of features and a high-quality rice cooker with this price. There are lots of features you got to try with this rice cooker and you a good deal with this price. Definitely will recommend to everyone :)
customer_reviews.author: Meiyi Lok

customer_reviews.title: A very good rice cooker for the price
customer_reviews.text: A very good rice cooker for the price. It has many functions for convenience whether you're cooking white or brown rice or porridge. After using it, I found the cooking quality to be nearly as good as Zojirushi for half the price for a comparable product. I would definitely recommend this rice cooker for people who want good quality rice, but who are on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: miaoxin huang

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it just set it and no need to ever worry about your food and pots getting burnt !
customer_reviews.author: Armor Guard Support Team

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I can cook almost everything with this cooker. Love the ceramic insider, plastic free.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: I very love my new rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Love my new rice cooker, as a stay-at-home mom, I have to cook everyday for my family, it's a perfect size, love the ceramic inner pot, something new to me, especially, I can even take that out to cook right on the cook top too, reasonable price for the rice cooker that does it's job, I will recommend to all of my friends too.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: After two years of using it . It stopped working . What a waste of money .
customer_reviews.author: Andres loaiza

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: It is my first time to use a rice.cooker with ceramic inner pot. it is very easy to clean after use. it is also very easy to use, you do not even need to read the manual before you use it. it come with a measuring cup for rice and a bamboo rice shovel. Good quality product. Like it.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: VERY EASY to use
customer_reviews.text: I definitely like the ceramic bowl! It is super easy to operate and clean. Compare to other rice cooker/multicooker in the similar price range, this is really a great buy. I use it to cook rice, make soup as well as steaming fish dishes. As a full-time working mom, this cooker is surely a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: It seems to have a good quality because it is really heavy
customer_reviews.text: It is the first time for me to use this kind of inner. It seems cleaner compared with my old stainless pot. It is enough big for the six people family. It seems to have a good quality because it is really heavy. Only when I open it the first time, there is a little plastic smell . It gets better after one night opening.
customer_reviews.author: haiyan wang

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really good product. I am really glad I chose this item! It is so easy to use and follow the instructions. Really happy with the performance and for a bargain price too! The Way it is packaged is also great, so that when it arrives, it is in great condition. Most important of all, the easy to use buttons in the cooker itself are self explanatory. Can’t recommend this enough! :)
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Makes Great Fluffy Rice
customer_reviews.text: Love this rice cooker with the ceramic pot. It makes very fluffy rice. Downside is the rim chipped soon after I got it without any one causing the damage. It just chipped out of nowhere. Still works so I still use it.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Multi-purpose ceramic cooker
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful cooker! It is sturdy and beautifully-designed. First of all, the ceramic pot is what I have been missing for so long. Not just for cooking rice, it has many functions and timing options that facilitate cooking many types of food conveniently. And the price is right! I would certainly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: S Lee

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a 5 star
customer_reviews.text: I love the ceramic inner pot, it is light weight and easy to clean. I cooked rice, soup and stew using the cooker’s preset functions!
customer_reviews.author: Serendipiter777

customer_reviews.title: It's a wonderful rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker has a lot functions. It cooked the rice so well. Making soup was much better than using a pot. It added more flavor than usual. I also can making yogurt with the yogurt function. Overall this is a great rice cooker at all.
customer_reviews.author: ZIHUA ZHAO

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! This is the first time I have bought a ceramic rice cooker. I use it not only to cook rice, but also to use it to cook soup. The most amazing thing is that I can also bring the ceramic pot on the stove to the stove. This is why I particularly like it. I read the above introduction and I can also do yogurt and other cooking methods. I will use it to try to do it for our family. It is also easy to clean. I am very happy to buy a multifunctional ceramic rice cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Kam Yeung

customer_reviews.title: NICE RICE
customer_reviews.text: Makes great rice! Use it daily. Wish it came in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Bonzo

customer_reviews.title: Great rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job. I wanted a cooker with a ceramic pot and this one works great. I wanted a cooker that didnt break the bank but didnt have a teflon or aluminum pot. Also needed one that made wild rice. Rice does not stick to the pot which makes for easy cleanup Would definitely recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Teran Grosz

customer_reviews.title: recommended by my colleague
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Aroma rice cooker, recommended by my colleague. I really like the ceramic inner pot, first time to try this material pot, it didn't disappoint me. It is so convenient to make porridge, my favorite food in the dry whether. I really like the rice cooker, definitely will recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: yan

customer_reviews.title: Durable product
customer_reviews.text: I bought it couple years ago and have kept using it for my every meal. Compared to the coating pot, I feel save to use it. It's durable.
customer_reviews.author: missgigi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome all-in-one rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: A great all-in-one rice cooker, there’s a lot different cooking setting for a variety of foods. Very easy to clean and use, great for those who are busy as you can cook your veggies and rice at the same time. Only this is that it’s a bit big, so it does take up a good amount of space.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Good qualtiy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for smaller portions of soup....I can control how well done I want the soup to get....love it.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Kearns

customer_reviews.title: Poorly manufactured
customer_reviews.text: I have now had to return 2 of these. The first one would emit a harsh metallic smell and not steam 80% of the time. The replacement just came in and as soon as we turn it on we get an E2 error which apparently means bad wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Aroma Housewares ARC-6206C Ceramic Rice Cooker/Multicooker, White
product_meta.description: Enjoy easy home cooking with the Aroma Professional 12-Cup (Cooked) Digital rice and multicooker with a ceramic inner pot. Restaurant-quality rice. Delicious one-pot dishes. Healthy soups and stews. Prepare all this and more at the touch of a button! Aroma takes the "cook" out of home cooking - turning kitchen time into your time! But the main attraction of this rice cooker is the ceramic inner pot. Ceramic is a healthy and natural alternative to pots with non-stick coating. Ceramic allows for food to be easily removed without the worry of added chemicals, so you can feel good about what you feed your family. And, ceramic holds heat evenly so all of your food will be cooked evenly throughout. One-pot meals and rice dinners have never been more natural, healthy, or easy.
feature_bullets: Ceramic Inner Pot – Our ceramic is a healthy and natural alternative to pots with non-stick coating. Ceramic allows for food to be easily removed without the worry of added chemicals, so you can feel good about what you feed your family.

Cool touch technology – cook without the worry of leaving a hot appliance out on the counter. Our cool touch outer surface allows the cooker to be handled at any point during the cooking process without the risk of encountering a hot surface.

Meal versatility – the options are endless! Whether you're cooking Soup, steaming veggies, or preparing traditional rice, this cooker can handle it all without issue. This cooker also offers unique options that take your cooking experience one step further. You can prepare a number of sweet treats like tarts, cakes, and even yogurt using the 12 different functions available.

Additional features – There is also the option to steam vegetables and meats while rice is cooking below for the most efficient single-pot meals. In addition, this appliance features easy-to-use, programmable digital controls with an automatic keep Warm setting, high and low slow cook settings, a cake function and much more.
Accessories – The ARC-6206C comes with an inner pot, steaming tray, rice measuring cup Soup Ladle, plastic rice paddle and bamboo rice paddle. Power consumption - 120 V/60Hz, 790W

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars363 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
